Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 2 Cūḷantaraduka » 2.6 Lokiyaduka » 2.6.3 Paccayavāra » 2.6.3.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 2.6.3.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Nahetu
Cūḷantaraduka
Lokiyaduka
Paccayavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Nahetu
143.
876Lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā lokiyo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—  ahetukaṃ lokiyaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ…pe…  (yāva asaññasattā) cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ…pe…  kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā ahetukā lokiyā khandhā, vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
